metadata.title: Portuguese Diagnostic Assessment - Production-Only
metadata.description: Comprehensive diagnostic test with granular topic tracking (A1→B2)
metadata.structure: Full diagnostic - all questions asked per phase with 70% topic pass for promotion

assessmentTypes.production: 146 questions - English to Portuguese with strategic chip options

metadata.changelog: v10.31: Added 6 voltar vs devolver (return: go back vs give back) questions. v10.30: Added 4 cá expressions (BP fixed phrases) questions. v10.29: Added 6 também vs tampouco (also vs neither) questions. v10.28: Added 6 mesmo vs próprio (same vs own) questions. v10.27: Added 6 deixar vs sair (leave behind vs depart) questions. v10.26: Added 6 achar vs pensar (think opinion vs cognitive) questions. v10.25: Added 6 jogar vs brincar vs tocar (play sports/toys/instruments) questions. v10.24: Added 6 algum vs nenhum (some vs none) questions. v10.23: Added 6 porque variations (por que/porque/porquê/por quê) questions. v10.22: Added 6 mais vs mas (more vs but) questions. v10.21: Added 6 muito/muita agreement questions. v10.20: Added 6 faz vs a (time expressions: ago vs in) questions. v10.19: Added 6 ainda vs já (still vs already) questions. v10.18: Added 6 levar vs trazer (take vs bring direction) questions. v10.17: Added 6 ir vs vir (go vs come direction) questions. v10.16: Added 6 mau vs mal (adjective vs adverb) questions. v10.15: Added 6 bom vs bem (adjective vs adverb) questions. v10.14: Added 6 pessoa/gente/a gente/o pessoal questions. v10.13: Added 6 tudo vs todo/a/os/as questions. v10.12: Added 6 demonstrative-adverb correlation questions (aqui→este, aí→esse, lá→aquele). v10.11: Added 21 Dr. Portuguese questions (object pronouns, ser/estar, saber/conhecer). v10.10: Added 18 questions for coverage gaps (relative pronouns, demonstratives, vocabulary, subjunctive). v10.9: Removed all 117 hints for true assessment. v10.8: Removed contrived basic scenarios. v10.7: Fixed tense/scenario mismatches. v10.6: Separated definite/indefinite article chips. v10.5: Clear gender markers only (-o/-a/-os/-as). v10.4: Removed adjective scenarios. v10.0: Production-only (removed 177 comprehension questions). v8.0: Strategic streamlining. v7.1: Fixed ambiguities.
metadata.scenarioCoverage: Strategic - contextual where beneficial, removed for basic drills
metadata.questionTypes: Production (EN→PT with chips) and Multi-step only
metadata.approach: No hints, clear gender markers, separated article types, proper scenarios
metadata.diagnosticMode: Full diagnostic - asks all phase questions, tracks topic performance, 70% pass threshold for next phase

phases.name: Foundation (A1)
phases.description: Absolute beginner - basic identity, present tense, articles, simple verbs

phases.name: Elementary (A2)
phases.description: Elementary - past tenses, questions, comparisons, irregular verbs

phases.name: Upper-Intermediate (B2)
phases.description: Upper-intermediate - future tense, conditional, subjunctive moods, advanced usage

scoring.comprehensionOnly: Can understand but not produce - needs speaking/writing practice
scoring.both: True mastery - can understand AND produce
scoring.placementLogic: Last unit where BOTH comprehension AND production passed
